profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.2.5 Form XObjects - PS
profile.description: A form XObject dictionary shall not contain the Subtype2 key with a value of PS or the PS key
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: A form XObject dictionary shall not contain the Subtype2 key with a value of PS or the PS key

error.message: The form XObject dictionary contains a PS key or Subtype2 key with value PS
